functionDecorators.name: addressSplit
functionDecorators.description: Make sure to perform a bounds check for @param pos, to avoid out of bounds access on @param _data. returns the address associated with a specific position pos.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: {bytes32 number of addresses}{bytes20 address 1}...{bytes20 address n}.

parameterDecorators.name: pos
parameterDecorators.description: the position of the address we want to retrieve.

functionDecorators.name: checkBalancesFromArray
functionDecorators.description: returns the balances from an array of addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: targets
parameterDecorators.description: the array of addresses for which we want to retrieve the balances.

functionDecorators.name: checkBalancesMemory
functionDecorators.description: returns the balances from concatenated addresses: {bytes32 balance address 1}...{bytes32 balance address n}.
